pull.title: Fix csBestBlock/cvBlockChange waiting in rpc/mining
pull.body:
This is an alternative to #11694.

It reintroduces a uint256 variable with the best block hash, protected by csBestBlock, and only updated while holding it.

Also rename the involved variable to modern guidelines, as there are very few uses.

events.body: Concept ACK! Much better than PR #11694 which I'm now closing :-)
utACK, although would prefer the renaming was in a separate commit.

events.message: Modernize best block mutex/cv/hash variable naming

events.body: utACK 4a6c0e3dcfdca98270cb96b73db4c3d4446dba50. Only change since last review renaming variables and splitting commit.

comments.body: Maybe prefix global variable name with `g_`. (I would probably call these `g_best_block` `g_best_block_mutex` `g_best_block_cv`.)
